about_the_game:
In the year 2181, humanity has advanced technologically to unsuspected limits. A new technological revolution has just started.
In this climax, three great corporations dominate over the genetics and robotics market, producing technology of the highest quality. Bionic implants which power up the subject’s abilities, genetic modifications to adapt the user to any environment and weapons so advanced that left the old firearms obsolete.
In this era, the competition between those companies is the most hard-fought of the latest times. To solve this conflict, the companies CEOs arrange a meeting and make a decision: to organise a tournament between modified champions who wield their latest releases.
Three representatives, one from each company, will fight to show the world the capabilities of their companies’ products in the most extravagant marketing campaign in history.

Tech Clash is a frantic 2D platform fighter where up to 4 players engage in chaotic brawls inside futuristic combat arenas.
  • 5 fighters from different corporations.
  • 5 game modes to play: 1v1, Deathmatch, Free for All, Team Mode and King Mode.
  • 4 combat arenas.
  • . . .and many punches and kicks.

name: Tech Clash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: In the far future huge companies compete for the control of the technological market, in this mayhem the CEOs of the biggest companies reunite and decide to fight it off in a tournament! Each company will provide a champion in what would be the fight of the century!
